testsuite.name: AppConfig Tests

testcase.name: getIntProperty should return default for non-existent key
getJsonFilePath should return path for students
getJsonFilePath for unknown entity should use default
getProperty with default should return default for non-existent key
hasProperty should return false for non-existent property
hasProperty should return true for existing property
getYamlFilePath for unknown entity should use default
getYamlFilePath should return path for courses
